settings.faq_title: What are the benefits of wearable technology?
settings.faq_description: Wearable technology like smartwatches can help us meet our fitness goals. These devices are versatile enough to carry out several hands-free functions, while we go about our daily activities. From receiving text messages or emails to GPS location tracking, a smartwatch offers more convenience when synced with your mobile phone. It is portable and lightweight, easy to carry around wherever you go.

settings.faq_title: What are the barriers in using a wearable device?
settings.faq_description:
The biggest barrier to using wearables is their limited battery life. Some smartwatches can be used for a full day or two on a single charge, depending on the brand. Others exhaust their battery in less than a day of normal use. You need to charge it daily to ensure continuous usage.

Another disadvantage would be the cost. The price difference between a smartwatch and a mobile phone is not that much. Some users would find buying a smartphone a better deal because it has more advantage in terms of screen size and storage. Moreover, certain smartwatch models are not water-resistant and have a shorter lifespan than mobile devices.

settings.faq_title: What is the difference between a smartwatch and a fitness tracker?
settings.faq_description: A smartwatch performs a general set of functions and fitness tracking is just one of them. It notifies users of recently received mails and text messages and has a whole range of activity monitors beyond fitness. On the other hand, a fitness tracker, also called a fitness band, is equipped with activity trackers that solely focus on health and exercise.

settings.faq_title: What are the benefits of wearing a smartwatch?
settings.faq_description: Compared to fitness trackers, you can cover more activities and functions when you wear a smartwatch. This is the best device for multitaskers who want to keep fit, receive work notifications and be on the loop at the same time. A smartwatch is a great companion for people on-the-go as it helps you adopt a well-rounded lifestyle. Built-in health monitors allow you to accomplish fitness goals while never missing important emails and messages.

settings.faq_title: How do I charge my wearable device?
settings.faq_description: Different smartwatch brands and models have different charging systems. Generally, however, you need a USB cable that connects the device to a power source. Some variants can be charged without a charger. Power Banks and certain USB ports may accommodate your smartwatch brand and model. There are also Dock Micro Type-C magnetic chargers you can use for faster results. When in doubt, check your manual for information or consult an expert.
